definition: to weigh in the hand/to consider/to ponder
to weigh in the hand/to estimate
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to measure

sentences.chinese: 她说每一句话都要仔细掂量。

sentences.english: The food is insidethea separate container of plastic or glass that traps heat energy.
sentences.chinese: 食物在一个独立的塑料或玻璃的来收集掂量的容器里。

sentences.english: He weighed the parcel in his hand(s).
sentences.chinese: 他用手掂量了一下这个包裹。

sentences.english: He weighed the mail in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 掂量了一下邮件的重量。

sentences.english: Bush then broke with his own tradition and weighed in on some mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 布什打破了自己的传统，也掂量了自己所犯的错误。

sentences.english: Pick up a clamshell and weigh it in your hand.
sentences.chinese: 捡起一个蛤壳，在手里掂量一下它有多重。

sentences.english: He tried to assess the veracity of the three legislators.
sentences.chinese: 他反复掂量着那三位议员所说的话是否可靠。

sentences.english: Weigh up the economic situation, the plan ran aground, and can only stay in dormitories.
sentences.chinese: 掂量一下经济情况，这一计划搁浅了，只能呆在宿舍。

sentences.english: He weighed the ideas in his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他在心中掂量着这个想法。

sentences.english: 'When I weighed everything, ' he says, 'I was able to sleep at night.
sentences.chinese: 他说，我掂量了所有的情况后，晚上就能安心睡觉了。

sentences.english: It seems that I have to consider how to deal with this matter myself.
sentences.chinese: 看来，这事只能我自己掂量着办了。

definition: to weigh in the hand/to estimate
to consider/to deliberate/to fill up a cup to the brim
to reckon/to consider/to turn over in one's mind
to plot/to scheme/to calculate
to consider/to weigh (a matter)/to balance (pros and cons)
weight/(fig.) importance
to reckon/to guess
to ponder/to reckon/to turn sth over in one's mind
to consider/to ponder
to ponder/to mull over/to think through/Taiwan pr. [zhuo2 mo2]
to carve and polish (jade)/to polish and refine a literary work
to speculate/to surmise/to wonder whether/to guess
see 分量[fen4 liang5]
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
to estimate/to assess
to analyze/to try to figure out/to try to fathom
cautious/careful/prudent
